mSplineMesh.description: The mesh to repeat on curved sections.

mSplineMeshLength.description: The size of each spline mesh.

mCollisionExtent.description: Extent of the collision components. X is forward.

mCollisionOffset.description: Offset of the collision components. X is forward.

mOverrideMaterial.description: The cached material, we cache this as the number of meshes grow/shrink as we drag the conveyor belt.

mUseInstancing.description: Whether to use instancing or not.

mSplineMeshComponents.description: The meshes that make up the spline.

mCustomDepthSplineMeshComponents.description: If we have enabled custom depth pass, then we store the custom depth spline meshes here

mSplineMeshInstances.description: The meshes that make up the spline when instanced.

mCustomDepthSplineMeshInstances.description: If we have enabled custom depth pass, this will be non-null

mSplineCollisionComponents.description: The collisions that make up the spline.
